p: All cell lines were obtained from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC): CD4+ human T-cells (MT-4), Madin-Darby bovine kidney (MDBK) (ATCC CCL 22 (NBL- 1) Bos taurus), baby hamster kidney (BHK-21) (ATCC CCL 10 (C-13) Mesocricetus auratus), and monkey kidney (Vero-76) (ATCC CRL 1587 Cercopithecus aethiops).
